const API_LOGGING_URL='http://backend-domain.com/api/logs';export const logEvent=async function(level,message){let metadata=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:{};const log={timestamp:new Date().toISOString(),level,message,metadata};try{// Отправка лога на сервер
await fetch(API_LOGGING_URL,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(log)});console.log('Log sent:',log);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to send log:',error);}};
